  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(GameLevel level, city.cs.engine.Shape enemy)

      Constructor for the Enemy class.

      Parameters:
      level - the world in which the enemy is being spawned in.
      enemy - the shape of the enemy being created.

  • Method Details

    • setupState

      public void setupState()
      Setup method for enemy state. Initial state set to stationary (idle).

    • inRangeRight

      public boolean inRangeRight()
      Boolean method

      Checks to see if the player is to the right of the enemy.

      Returns:
      True or False, depending on whether the player is in the range of the enemy to the right.

    • inRangeLeft

      public boolean inRangeLeft()
      Boolean method.

      Checks to see if the player is to the left of the enemy.

      Returns:
      True or False, depending on whether the player is in the range of the enemy to the left.

    • preStep

      public void preStep​(city.cs.engine.StepEvent e)
      Specified by:
      preStep in interface city.cs.engine.StepListener

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Sets the speed and direction the enemy moves in depending on current state.

      Used to prevent enemy from slowing down and stopping.

    • step

      public void step()
      Method for StepListener

      If player is in range of enemy (left or right), the current state is changed accordingly.

    • getEnemyName

      public abstract java.lang.String getEnemyName()
      Abstract method that lets each individual enemy return their name.
      Returns:
      Enemy name
